name: Elite Army Shooter
description:
You mission is to become a stealth sniper and take out all the major criminals one by one which are spreading terror in the country.

Be wise while using the ammo, taking a headshot should be your first priority so that there are no chances of survival of your target. This is a war you are in. Get a brilliant FPS Sniper game available on store with HD graphics and cool SFX.

DOWNLOAD NOW..!!

Features:
* Best rifle and sniper gun for accurate shooting.
* Realistic 3D shooting and effects
* Use swipe controls to aim.
* Use fire button to hit the enemies.
